ygData.subject: Re: Will my account still be good?
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as your last characters... if you quit more than 3 months ago, there is a good chance they ve been wiped. SOE usually holds on to folks characters for
ygData.messageBody:
As far as your last characters... if you quit
more than 3 months ago, there is a good chance they've
been wiped. SOE usually holds on to folks' characters
for 3 months from when their last pay period was
ended. If it's been more than that, there's about a 3%
chance they'll still be there... sometimes SOE misses
some cleanup duties.<br><br>As far as servers... I'm
going to agree with Xela.<br>I enjoy playing on Xev,
usually. And Firiona Vie is a kick. <br><br>Nukai
Oakenwulf<br>Chosen of Tunare<br>Chief Druid Executive of Spiritus
Valorum, Karana Server
